reviewText:
Nowhere did we read that this movie is in Chinese.  We only speak English so this was a waste of money.  Since this is our 1st try at a movie download we regret this service is no use for our family
Only gave it one star bc I couldn't give zero stars
it's zombies :)

I enjoy low-budget movies.  I enjoy independent features.  This was however, one of the single worse movies I have ever seen, and one of a very small handful of movies that my Saturday movie night group has actually turned off.  This group has been meeting for DECADES.
The only solace I have in watching this movie (part way) is that I may be able to spare someone else the waste of their good times.
Great Movie
Acting was a little off, and same for story
"Now this is one movie that shouldn't have been made, it not only bad, it's awful!
Jack Chan was sexy :@)
Horrible. Wish I didn't waste my money on this. I think I watched 20 minutes and shut if off
It was not mentioned in the description that it was in Chinese and had subtitles. As others has stated, it's a bad movie and only watched a few minutes of it.
very bad lol
Waste of money!  In Chinese.  Could not even watch after a few min.  Joke.  I want a refund!
Wasn't impressed at all. Definitely low budget.
Have you ever started a movie while thinking,  How bad can it be?  Well it can be this bad! There is nothing good about this movie. Its not even funny bad. Its just bad bad.

Nothing to write home about but OK for an evening with a bowl of popcorn.  Some decent fight scenes.  Too many flashbacks that didn't contribute.
 Subtitles.
U have to see it. And think!  Why we have this disater!

What's not to like?  zombies with decent makeup, plenty of gore to go around, and several awesome martial arts scenes...

I suspect everyone who rated this as 1 star was just made that it is Chinese with subtitles...  frankly, I love foreign flicks, so I have no qualms with dealing with a few subtitles...

Overall...  I thought this was a really well done zombie flick...  two thumbs up from me...
Incredible waste of money. Amazon needs to tell people this is a subtitled movie. I never would have purchased it.

I love zombie movies, but this was so so, at best.  Not so bad bad guys, non-scientific mad scientist, a robbery that was botched before it began (object of heist was ignored and hostages left alone - land lines intact and no one calls the cops).  Watchable for the devotee.
Stupid plot and bad acting.
No where does it mention that the movie is in Chinese. I didn't even finish watching because i didn't feel like reading the whole movie.
Really sucked...don't waste your time
